  4. Macro
  5. Variable
Clone the repo to the local-projects/ subdirectory of your QuickLisp distribution: 

$ cd path/to/quicklisp/local-projects
$ git clone https://github.com/cwchentw/cl-yautils.git
Later, require it in either a Lisp session or a Lisp script: 

(require "cl-yautils")

; Optional
(use-package :cl-yautils)
Created with Codex.
